item.title: Strongly typed identifiers in Swift
item.description: Strings as identifiers are always a bit dangerous, leaving the door open to typos and resulting bugs. However, as Tom Lokhorst describes in this post, we can do better. Tom looks at a few options to transform our String identifiers into strongly typed identifiers. Of the ideas presented, I prefer the second alternative.
